sentences.en: ...a chicken leg.
sentences.cn: …一只鸡腿。

sentences.en: a young boy with skinny legs
sentences.cn: 双腿干瘦的小男孩

sentences.en: First he kicked the left leg, then he kicked the right.
sentences.cn: 他先踢左腿，然后踢右腿。

sentences.en: Forsyth is doubtful for tonight's game with a badly bruised leg.
sentences.cn: 福赛斯腿部严重擦伤，不大可能参加今晚的比赛。

sentences.en: He doesn't have a leg to stand on in this debate.
sentences.cn: 在这次辩护中，他完全站不住脚

sentences.en: He had to have one leg amputated above the knee.
sentences.cn: 他的一条腿不得不从膝部以上截断。

sentences.en: He was barely able to drag his poisoned leg behind him.
sentences.cn: 他极费力地拖着那条中毒的腿走路。

sentences.en: He was knocked over by a bus and broke his leg.
sentences.cn: 他被一辆公共汽车撞倒，一条腿折了。

sentences.en: he wasn't afraid to get up on his hind legs at a social gathering and talk.
sentences.cn: 他不怕在社交聚会上起立发言。

sentences.en: I bandaged the leg up and gave her aspirin for the pain.
sentences.cn: 我把她的腿用绷带包扎起来，并给了她阿司匹林止痛。

sentences.en: I was in excruciating pain and one leg wouldn't move.
sentences.cn: 我忍受着剧痛，一条腿无法动弹。

sentences.en: Is there an alternative to traction for a broken leg?
sentences.cn: 对于腿部骨折有什么方法替代牵引治疗吗？

sentences.en: It has caused a bad break to Gabriella's leg.
sentences.cn: 这导致加布里埃拉一条腿严重骨折.

sentences.en: Of course I won't tell them; I was only pulling your leg.
sentences.cn: 我当然不会告诉他们啦。我跟你开玩笑的。

sentences.en: Scott's muscle atrophied, his leg became stunted, and he was left lame.
sentences.cn: 斯科特的肌肉萎缩，一条腿发育不完全，成了个瘸子。

sentences.en: She awoke with a numbed feeling in her left leg.
sentences.cn: 她醒来觉得左腿麻木。

sentences.en: She fell and broke her leg.
sentences.cn: 她摔断了腿。

sentences.en: She has one slightly withered leg, noticeably thinner than the other.
sentences.cn: 她有一条腿有点儿萎缩，看上去明显比另一条腿瘦。

sentences.en: The bullet lodged in the sergeant's leg, shattering his thigh bone.
sentences.cn: 子弹嵌进了中士的腿里，使其股骨碎裂。

sentences.en: the foundry business was on its last legs.
sentences.cn: 铸造生意朝不保夕。

sentences.en: We have a leg up on the competition.
sentences.cn: 我们在这次竞争中享有优势

sentences.en: Weir broke his leg in a freak accident playing golf.
sentences.cn: 韦尔因为一次打高尔夫时发生的离奇事故折断了腿。

words.tran_cn: 长腿的；茎长的；腿细长的
织袜统工人；用腿蹬洞壁使船过运河隧洞的人
奔走；用脚移动或推动（leg的过去分词）

phrases.phrase: a leg to stand on&I{【俚语】}
phrases.tran_cn: 站得住脚的基础：有根据、符合逻辑的辩护基础；支持
祝好运；大获成功（用于祝愿演员演出成功）
向后退；裹足不前；犹豫不决；摇摆不定
【板球】触身得分(球触及击球员手以外的身体任何部位而使对手得分)
小腿长，焊脚长度；下档尺寸
n. 帮助（对上马或跨跃障碍时的）
小腿；（侧泳）靠下面的腿；胫

phrases.phrase: not have a leg to stand on

phrases.tran_cn: （球，尤指高尔夫球）力度不够，不到位
枯竭，江郎才尽：某人力量或才智的尽头；即将崩溃、失败或死亡

trans.tran_cn: 腿，支柱，支架，裤腿，一段赛程
trans.tran_en: one of the long parts of your body that your feet are joined to, or a similar part on an animal or insect
one of the long parts of your body that your feet are joined to, or a similar part on an animal or insect
to run in order to escape from someone or something
